problem:
Let $\omega$ be a nonreal root of $x^3 = 1,$ and let
\[\mathbf{M} = \begin{pmatrix} -\omega^2 & - \omega \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix}.\]Find the sum of the entries of $\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}.$
solution:
Since $\omega^3 = 1,$ $\omega^3 - 1 = 0.$  Then
\[(\omega - 1)(\omega^2 + \omega + 1) = 0.\]Since $\omega \neq 1,$ $\omega^2 + \omega + 1 = 0.$

We compute the first few powers of $\mathbf{M}$:
\begin{align*}
\mathbf{M}^2 &= \begin{pmatrix} -\omega^2 & - \omega \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} -\omega^2 & - \omega \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix} \\
&= \begin{pmatrix} \omega^4 - \omega & \omega^3 \\ -\omega^2 & -\omega \end{pmatrix} \\
&= \begin{pmatrix} 0 & 1 \\ -\omega^2 & -\omega \end{pmatrix}, \\
\mathbf{M}^3 &= \begin{pmatrix} 0 & 1 \\ -\omega^2 & -\omega \end{pmatrix} \begin{pmatrix} -\omega^2 & - \omega \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix} \\
&= \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 0 \\ \omega^4 - \omega & \omega^3 \end{pmatrix} \\
&= \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{pmatrix}.
\end{align*}Since $\mathbf{M}^3 = \mathbf{I},$ the powers of $\mathbf{M}$ are periodic with period 3, so
\begin{align*}
\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009} &= 670 \mathbf{M} + 670 \mathbf{M}^2 + 669 \mathbf{M}^3 \\
&= 670 \begin{pmatrix} -\omega^2 & - \omega \\ 1 & 0 \end{pmatrix} + 670 \begin{pmatrix} 0 & 1 \\ -\omega^2 & -\omega \end{pmatrix} + 669 \begin{pmatrix} 1 & 0 \\ 0 & 1 \end{pmatrix} \\
&= \begin{pmatrix} -670 \omega^2 + 669 & -670 \omega + 670 \\ 670 - 670 \omega^2 & -670 \omega + 669 \end{pmatrix}.
\end{align*}The sum of the entries is then
\begin{align*}
&(-670 \omega^2 + 669) + (-670 \omega + 670) + (670 - 670 \omega^2) + (-670 \omega + 669) \\
&= -1340 \omega^2 - 1340 \omega + 2678 \\
&= 1340 + 2678 = \boxed{4018}.
\end{align*}For a quicker solution, we can note that the sum of the entries in $\mathbf{M},$ $\mathbf{M^2},$ and $\mathbf{M}^3$ are all equal to 2.  Thus, the sum we seek is $2009 \cdot 2 = \boxed{4018}.$

We are asked to find the sum of the entries of $\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}.$

where $\mathbf{M}^{2009} = -\omega^2 \mathbf{M}.$

\begin{align*} \left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) \left(\mathbf{I} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}\right) &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}^2 - \omega^3 \mathbf{M}^3 - \dots - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}^{2009}\\
&= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}^2 - \mathbf{M} - \omega \mathbf{M}^2 - \dots - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}^{200

&= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \mathbf{M} - \omega \mathbf{M}^2 - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}^2 - \dots \\
&= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \left(
\[\left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) \left(\mathbf{I} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}\right) = \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \left(\omega + \omega^2\right)\left(\mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right).\]
\begin{align*} \left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) \left(\mathbf{I} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}\right) &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \left(\omega + \omega^2\right)\left(\mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) \\ &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \left(\omega + \omega^2\right)\mathbf{M}^{2009} \\ &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} - \left(\omega + \omega^2\right)\left(-\omega^2 \
Since $(\omega + \omega^2) = -1,$ we have
\begin{align*} \left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) \left(\mathbf{I} - \omega^2 \mathbf{M}\right) &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} + \mathbf{M}^{2010} \\ &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2008} + \mathbf{M}^{2009} \\ &= \mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009} + \mathbf{M}^{2009} \\ &= \left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) + \left(\
## Step 4
\[\left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right)^2 - \left(\mathbf{M} + \mathbf{M}^2 + \mathbf{M}^3 + \dots + \mathbf{M}^{2009}\right) = \mathbf{M}^{2009}.\]
